name: Forest of Evil (itch)
description:
This game was created by an independent 3 person development team of brothers in spare time over the course of approximately 1 year. One person uses the pixel software "Aesprite" to create the sprites and pixel art and also composes the unique music. The second uses "Unity 2D" to bring it all together with the coding\programing. And the third offers encouragement, testing, criticisms, manages the store page, keeps track of discussions posted on the discussions page, and other support when needed.

MATURE CONTENT DESCRIPTION

The developers describe the content like this:

This game contains pixelated violence in the form of a knight of the crusades fighting against creatures of darkness. It depicts pixelated blood spurts in the deaths of some enemies, some gore in the deaths of some enemies, and pixelated burning in the deaths of some enemies. In one level this game also depicts pixelated human body parts in pickled jars waiting to be eaten by the murderous creatures of darkness who live there.
